alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 12:09AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LINE OF MODEST THUNDERSTORMS ADVANCING EAST THROUGH THE MAGIC VALLEY AND SOUTH-CENTRAL HIGHLANDS THROUGH 100 AM MDT... At 1206 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of modest thunderstorms extending from 12 miles east of Jerome to 11 miles south of Hansen to 20 miles west of Oakley Reservoir to 10 miles southeast of Rogerson, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph. Brief moderate rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Moderate rain on the Badger Fire Scar may create enhanced runoff. Locations impacted include... Burley, Rupert, Heyburn, Oakley Reservoir, Paul, Oakley, Declo, Albion, Acequia, Mt Harrison, Kimama, Laidlaw Corrals Airport, Bostetter Ranger Station, Interstate 84 And 86 Junction and western City Of Rocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
